name: CarePoint
tag_list: therapy-software, documentation-software, therapy-billing, rehab-software, therapy-management-system, online-scheduling-system, physical-therapy, occupational-therapy, speech-therapy, sql-server, visualbasic-net
overview:
CarePoint was founded in 1999 with a vision to develop a comprehensive therapy management system that is both easy to learn and easy to use, yet has the power to manage a large therapy organization.

CarePoint is a comprehensive Therapy Management System designed to improve the quality of patient care and profitability of your therapy practice. CarePoint Software is available in two software package suites - Inpatient & Outpatient Editions. Each edition includes Complete Documentation Software, Therapy Billing Interface, Clinical Compliance Oversight Module, Patient & Staff Scheduling System, and Advanced Clinical & Management Reporting Tools. Our highly experienced team of healthcare and information technology professionals has made CarePoint the highest-rated therapy management system on the market today.
